us.pserver.revok.server

Class AbstractServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.server.AbstractServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Server
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RevokServer

    public abstract class AbstractServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server
    Abstract class implementing basic object server functions.
    Version:
    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com
    See Also:
    Server
